柣字的基本解释

柣
zhì
门槛：“樗……为柣为枨且不可，况为负任器耶？”

柣
dié
〔桔柣〕中国春秋时郑国城门名。

柣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直一切，入質，澄。］
［《廣韻》千結切，入屑，清。］
(1)门下横木，门槛。
(2)用木击打。
[②]［dié］
［《集韻》徒結切，入屑，定。］
春秋郑有桔柣门。见《左传·庄公二十八年》。

柣字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　柣； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页520第05
【唐韻】直一切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】直質切，?音秩。門限也。【爾雅·釋宮】柣謂之閾。　又【博雅】柣，砌也。又鐵也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?千結切，音竊。義同。　又【集韻】【韻會】徒結切【正韻】杜結切，音迭。桔柣，門名。【左傳·莊二十八年】楚子元伐鄭，入于桔柣之門。　又柣?，山名。【山海經】支離山之東有柣?山。　又【集韻】大一切。義同。

柣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
柣字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
sill
zhì
Threshold: "Ah... it's a shameful and unacceptable thing, and it's a negative one?"
sill
dié
〔Jiqi〕The name of the gate of Zheng State in the Spring and Autumn Period of China.
sill
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" straightens everything, enters the quality, and clarifies. ]
["Guangyun" Thousand knots cut, cut into chips, clear. ]
(1) The horizontal wood under the door and the threshold.
(2) Strike with wood.
[②]［dié］
["Jiyun" only knots, cuts, and sets. ]
In the Spring and Autumn Period, Zheng has an orange door. See "Twenty-eight Years of Zuo Zhuan·Zhuanggong".
sill
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　柣; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 520 05
[Tang Yun] Straighten everything [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Straight quality cut, the sound rank. The threshold is also. 【Erya·Shigong】Qi said the threshold.　[Bo Ya] Zeng, build it. It's iron too.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Thousand knots cut, sound stealing. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] Du Jieqie [Zheng Yun] Du Jieqie, sound duplication. Juqi, the name of the door. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-eight years] Chu Ziyuan defeated Zheng and entered the gate of Juqi.　Again?, the name of the mountain. [Shanhaijing] There is a mountain on the east side of the mountain.　[Jiyun] Everything. The same meaning.
